About Me

I'm a Software Engineer has a real passion for Mobile Development and Server-Side Development, willing to learn new technologies, and looking forward to working in a team to learn from everyone's experiences and improve my mentality.

Work History

HQSOFT - DISTRIBUTION & RETAIL SOLUTION EXPERT

Android Developer - April 2019 - March 2022

Developed the company's DMS software on the mobile system. Received and analyzed customers' requirements, front-end, back-end, maintenance, testing, documentation.

  • Resolving the application's issues to serve thousands of users (Contact the user to find more information about the issues, track and read the log data, and review code to find a root cause of the issues and resolve these issues as soon as possible).
  • Customizing the application based on user requirements (Analyzing business requirements and the application's database and process to find a solution that customizes the application as little as possible).
  • Handling both Client-Side (Android) and Server-Side (ASP.Net, SOAP, SQL Server) of the application.
  • A member of the Scrum Development Team.
  • Key role delivering and supporting the Android application.
  • Supporting new members.
  • Working on fixing bugs and improving application performance.
  • Integrating outside company data sources and API.
  • Developing applications for some scanner devices run in Android OS (Ex: PDA Scanner).

 

Company projects that I have participated in:

C# Java ASP.NET API SQL SQLite Android

Businessman - December 2021 - Present

Help my brother grow his business in the fashion industry.
